resources.string: Erreur lors de l\'abonnement à la chaine
Impossible de vérifier si l\'utilisateur est abonné à cette chaine (id=%s)
Impossible de vous désabonner de cette chaine (id=%s)

Import your subscriptions from YouTube, by first visiting https://www.youtube.com/subscription_manager, and clicking the "Export Subscriptions" button at the bottom. Then, select the xml file you exported by clicking Upload XML File below.
No YouTube channels were found in the XML file you uploaded.
No YouTube channels that you are not already subscribed to were found in the XML file you uploaded.
An error was encountered attempting to parse the XML file you uploaded: %s.
Failed to import your YouTube subscriptions.
